sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Get table description</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var manager = GlideDBObjectManager.get(); var fields = Object.keys(manager); function getAccessibleFields(field){ return field.toLowerCase() == field ; } function getFieldDescription(field){ return field + ' - ' + typeof manager[field]; } gs.log(fields.filter(getAccessibleFields).map(getFieldDescription).toString().replaceAll(',', '\n'));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-28 18:57:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>09515f542f095110d8a4d5f62799b65b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Get table description</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_09515f542f095110d8a4d5f62799b65b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-07-28 19:12:35</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
